infodynamics.utils

Class AnalyticMeasurementDistribution

  • java.lang.Object
    • infodynamics.utils.MeasurementDistribution
      • infodynamics.utils.AnalyticMeasurementDistribution
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChiSquareMeasurementDistribution

    public class AnalyticMeasurementDistribution
extends MeasurementDistribution
    Generic class to represent analytic distributions of info theoretic measurements under some null hypothesis of a relationship between the variables. This class is not designed to be creatable - it's children (which represent various concrete distributions) are those which should be created.
    Author:
    Joseph Lizier (email, www)

        actualValue - observed value of the information-theoretic measure
        pValue - p-value that surrogate measurements are greater than the observed value.
